event: presented to Accident and Emergency Department
symptomatic treatment for presumed upper respiratory tract infection
urgent noncontrast CT of the brain
subtle fullness in right frontal region
diffuse mucosal thickening in paranasal sinuses
severe mass effect in right cerebral hemisphere
fluid-filled paranasal sinuses with mucosal hyperenhancement
small bony defect in posterior wall of left frontal sinus
retrospective confirmation of bone defect on initial CT
intensive care unit stay for 5 days
follow-up CT showing improved mass effect
follow-up CT showing improved cerebral edema
